response.original_title: The Highwaymen / The Other Side of the Road
response.overview: On the documentary The Highwaymen The Other Side of the Road,  Yeager discovers where the Highwaymen gather to paint, and captures rare moments with artists Charles Walker, Johnny Daniels, Jimmy Stovall, and Livingston Roberts all gathered together talking about the old days, Alfred Hair, Al Black, and the lost Freddie paintings.  Yeager also interviews Alfred Hairâ€™s family and others who knew Alfred personally.
response.title: The Highwaymen / The Other Side of the Road
